text: Moses Gunn (October 2, 1929 â€“ December 16, 1993) was an American actor. He co- founded the Negro Ensemble Company in the 1960s. He was known mostly for Broadway stage plays. Gunn was born in St. Louis, Missouri. He died from asthma at sixty-four. Category:American stage actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from St. Louis, Missouri Category:1929 births
title: Moses Gunn
